How to use Icons

18 Oct 2017
icons Friday Theme CSS
Back to all posts

Here‚Äôs how to use the Entypo icons in the Friday Theme as SVGs It‚Äôs easy with Jekyll‚Äôs include tag and Bootstrap 4 classes.

Bootstrap 3 shipped with the Glyphicons built-in as icon files and accompanying CSS classes. Bootstrap 4 doesn‚Äôt have these, but does point you to some SVG icon libraries. With Jekyll‚Äôs include and Bootstrap 4‚Äôs flex layout, it‚Äôs easy to use the SVGs inline without writing lots of icon-related CSS.

Example

A clock icon in grey left-aligned

A cycle icon in red right-aligned

Source

CSS

The markup above uses .icon to control the icon‚Äôs size and and .red or .grey as examples of controlling its colour.

Bootstrap takes care of the layout. d-flex align-items-center ensures the icon is vertically aligned along the center line with the accompanying content and ml-2 and mr-2 take care of horizontal spacing.

The following CSS is already in theme/css/site.css and can easily be extended for different colours.
